title: Jesus Nunu is going to get annihilated because of Pro-play, he has everything a Pro could want
body:
* CC out the ass
* Insane sustain
* Insane gank potential
* Objective Control
* A Buff Aura
* High Base Damage

The second he becomes available to pro's I already know he'll be pick/ban. All they'll have to do on him is pick up a little bit of AP then go full tank and run out of the jungle with full HP thanks to his insane Q sustain, barrel down on the enemy at mach 3 with a maxed out snowball and guarantee the enemy's flash or a 1st blood with that nutbar base damage and knock-up. And then he'll get his ult and the targets will be practically 100% dead if they don't have flash or some crazy mobility range {{champion:164}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:18}}

replies.body: Agreed, once he is enabled in pro play and is abused, we will likely see him be hard nerfed. Makes me sad.

I loved playing him, I did a couple games in bots just to experiment and everything feels so smooth, but it's just **_too good._**

Go in with W for big burst+knockup, follow-up with E root, run ahead a bit and start channeling ult, it's a guaranteed kill if you have the smallest bit of AP and the enemy has no mobility at all.

And the sustain holy shit dude, you're at 1/3 HP and his Q will heal you for 400 HP off 1 minion WITH 0 AP, it's fucking insane.

> [{quoted}](name=VoidBorn13,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R1wtwwZE,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-09-02T00:44:30.035+0000)
>
> I loved playing him, I did a couple games in bots just to experiment and everything feels so smooth, but it's just **_too good._**
> 
> Go in with W for big burst+knockup, follow-up with E root, run ahead a bit and start channeling ult, it's a guaranteed kill if you have the smallest bit of AP,
> 
> And the sustain holy shit dude, you're at 1/3 HP and his Q will heal you for 400 HP off 1 minion WITH 0 AP, it's fucking insane.

he has no real burst past 20 minutes tbh

And? The knock-up on his W alone make's it a perfect ganking tool, and if his damage somehow starts falling off against champs with how ridiculous his Ult damage damage scales his he'll just waltz back into the jg with his 980 true damage Q ensuring the enemy has no jungle presence whatsoever.

He doesn't have to do insane 1-shot damage to be useful, his CC and the THREAT of even his lowest base damages forcing out mobility and flashes will make him a pick/ban in pro, there are no doubts.

> [{quoted}](name=VoidBorn13,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R1wtwwZE,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2018-09-02T00:52:12.221+0000)
>
> And? The knock-up on his W alone make's it a perfect ganking tool, and if his damage somehow starts falling off against champs with how ridiculous his Ult damage damage scales his he'll just waltz back into the jg with his 980 true damage Q ensuring the enemy has no jungle presence whatsoever.
> 
> He doesn't have to do insane 1-shot damage to be useful, his CC and the THREAT of even his lowest base damages forcing out mobility and flashes will make him a pick/ban in pro, there are no doubts.

He lost some objective control for hard cc and more support like.  But yeh the attack speed steroid might make kaisa bs

How did he lose objective control when his chomp does the same damage to minions it always has?  I mean, he lost the ability to boost it with visionary, but smite+chomp still does a consistent ~1500+ true damage that guarantees any buff/dragon/baron.

Nunu is far less safe on objectives than he was previously. He's lost a good 400 health at max level, plus an extra 10% max health from Consume. 

Yes, he has more ways to actively control the zone, but he is vulnerable to AOE from over the wall and the enemy jungler simply hopping over and killing him.

Ah, you mean the loses to base stats.

Yeah, true.  They trimmed his stats to massively buff is kit, that's fair.  I think he'll still be an objective control machine with a tank build, but he does have little to no survivability on his kit now, forcing him to buy it.

B-B-But Boards said every champion has mobility and no immobile champion {{champion:20}}  canâ€™t compete.

Boards never wrong.
another for the alter
{{champion:20}} is going to end up {{champion:13}}'d/{{champion:429}}'d/{{champion:268}}'d. {{item:3070}}
Galio too :(

he's gonna be gutted like sejuani and gragas. sigh. another champ to have their grave dug at the hand of LC$ and pro play.
either he'll be nerfed when he's allowed in lcs, or buffed because of weak numbers and then gutted once the pros abuse him. one of the two.

Or they'll just rightfully nerf his W like they should have within 2 hours of his launch. Thing does way too much damage for how reliable it is and how much CC it has that leads into everything else in his kit.
It wasn't a nerf. It was a bug fix.

> [{quoted}](name=Z3Sleeper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R1wtwwZE,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-09-02T07:39:29.884+0000)
>
> Or they'll just rightfully nerf his W like they should have within 2 hours of his launch. Thing does way too much damage for how reliable it is and how much CC it has that leads into everything else in his kit.

The thing is his w has low cc and damage if he just presses it.
You're right and it makes me sick.

> [{quoted}](name=VoidBorn13,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R1wtwwZE,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-09-02T00:39:21.201+0000)
>
> * CC out the ass


I read up to here and I already agree with the entire post, whatever it was about.
That's what happens when you make a champion overloaded as fuck, tbh.
Tbfh the new Nunu feels a lot more fair to play against than the old one that could just one shot you with his AP ult.
if you stayed in radius of his ult for about four seconds?

No gap closer, no wall jump = shitty tank initiator
No kill threat = shitty carry jungler
= will probably not be abusable by the pros.

His W is a gap closer since it speeds him up and gets pretty huge.

Him having a knock up and a root are enough kill pressure for ganking in the majority of situations, on top of him boosting his laner's attack speed.

His ult is a lot of damage provided he can channel it for a bit, which his kit secures the enemy being unable to leave without a mobility spell of some sort (as mentioned by the OP).

While he can't go over walls, with practice his Snowball can be used to go through the jungle all the same.

> [{quoted}](name=crippler38,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R1wtwwZE,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2018-09-02T15:50:53.435+0000)
>
> His W is a gap closer since it speeds him up and gets pretty huge.
> 
> Him having a knock up and a root are enough kill pressure for ganking in the majority of situations, on top of him boosting his laner's attack speed.
> 
> His ult is a lot of damage provided he can channel it for a bit, which his kit secures the enemy being unable to leave without a mobility spell of some sort (as mentioned by the OP).
> 
> While he can't go over walls, with practice his Snowball can be used to go through the jungle all the same.

While I don't play league much and I haven't seen nunu in action, I don't think a small move speed move counts as a gap closer.
A lot of champs have knockups which are easier to use, such as gragas and that weird femal void monster whose name I can't remember. The fact is, reliability is key when it comes to knockups and gap closers for initiation and I think Nunu's are too telegraphed countered by wards. Also, still no to the wall jumps bruv.

If it means anything he can make it ranged and a lot of nunus take predator to make it fast as fuq boi.

Unless you dive into say, Morgana or something, it's fast enough to get a gank off.


EDIT: It's also fast enough that you can generally catch people with it, and it turns better the longer you go.

Nunu will be a only pro play champ just like {{champion:13}}  and {{champion:113}}.
But as of now, no word of nunu is on the pro scene.
I hear its because of champs with walls that push out of competitive play. {{champion:48}}  {{champion:34}}  {{champion:516}} {{champion:2}} , olaf because ragnarok makes him immune to cc.
I don't mind him getting nerfs , he is already pain to deal with
I honestly doubt it, the thing with champions that get gutted for pro play is that they usually have no counterplay when played at max potential while nunu still has plenty.
Job security for the rework team.
Ban rate will be really high, plus since there really isnt any point of taking jungle you could honestly gank 10 times, or camp one lane before 6, and no one would be suprised
I love playing him, can camp all 3 lanes while still clearing the jungle - at least for me (not a jungle main); Newnu feels like the most efficient and useful  jungler ever.
No and this is a shitpost.
